column3: The total number of ballots expected. Example: 500000
The margin, in percentage points. Example: 5
The type of RLA, either "polling" or "comparison". Example: polling
The hourly rate for employees, in US dollars. Example: 20
Whether or not this is a pilot or first-time RLA, either "yes" or "no". Example: yes
The number of individual contests that will be audited. Example: 3
The number of separate locations that will conduct part of the audit. Example: 1
